value:
Let the Rewards Roll In:
Send your Heroes to scout other
parts of the world of Heroes, like
Askr, Nifl, and Hel, and return
with various items.

Once Heroes are dispatched, all
you have to do is wait!

Recovery Gauge:
As Heroes return and fill the
recovery gauge, you will
receive items.

Hero strength will not affect the
recovery gauge's progress.

No Strikes, No Sagas:
In Lost Lore: Spoils, there are no
foes to strike, and lore you collect
will not be compiled into a saga.

Bonus Titles:
When a Hero from a game in the
Bonus Titles list is sent out, they
offer the following benefits:
・ Recovery gauge fills faster.
・ Additional items are returned.

Support:
If you send out partnered Heroes,
their support rank will increase
slightly afterward.
